title: Hopf q-braces structures on rank one pointed Hopf algebras
authors: Jorge A. Guccione, Juan J. Guccione and Christian Valqui
abstract:
In this paper we determine all the Hopf q-brace structures on rank one
pointed Hopf algebras and compute the socle of each one of them. We also
identify which among them are Hopf skew-braces. Then we determine when two Hopf
q-brace structures on rank one pointed Hopf algebras are isomorphic, and,
finally, we compute all the weak braiding operators on these Hopf algebras.
